title: Download a remote mysql database using ssh
info:
This script creates a dump of a remote database and save it locally.
For example: `ssh user@example.com "mysqldump -hlocalhost -uuser -p1234 my_db" > my_db.sql`

title: Download and execute locally a remote mysql database using ssh
info:
This script creates a dump of a remote database and execute it locally.
For example: `ssh user@example.com "mysqldump -hlocalhost -uuser -p1234 my_db" | mysql -uroot local_db`
